items.title: Forma Banking App
items.description: A minimalist mobile banking experience focused on clarity and ease of use. Redesigned the entire user flow resulting in 35% faster transaction completion.

items.title: Workspace Dashboard
items.description: B2B SaaS dashboard for project management. Created a clean, data-driven interface that improved user task completion by 40%.

items.title: Minimal E-commerce
items.description: High-end fashion e-commerce platform with a focus on product photography and minimal interface. Increased conversion rate by 28%.

items.title: Health Tracking App
items.description: iOS app for tracking wellness metrics with an emphasis on simplicity and daily habits. Featured on the App Store.

items.title: Design System
items.description: Comprehensive design system for a growing startup, including components, patterns, and guidelines used across 5 products.

items.title: Portfolio Platform
items.description: Platform for creatives to showcase their work with customizable templates and seamless content management.
